document_data.name: Elaint Marsk
document_data.mainbody: '''Elaint Marsk''' was the heir of [[Marsk House]] in [[Melvaunt]] in [[1374 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Elaint was undergoing training at the Temple to [[Oghma]] in Melvaunt.
document_data.History:
In 1374 DR, he was ordained as a [[cleric]] at the temple. However, secretly he met with his friends [[Argens Bruil]], [[Kalman Leiyraghon]], [[Kara Calaudra]], and [[Oreal Nanther]]. They planned to go on adventure, with the support of the [[dwarf]] mercenary [[Dorn Crownshield]].

They found a "treasure map" (in truth, a trap devised by [[Bremen Leiyraghon]]) and went to adventure in [[Thar]], only to be captured by the [[orog]] [[Daazlag]] and his [[orc]] minions.

Elaint was imprisoned in a cave in [[XÃ»l-Jarak]] with all his friends. Elaint was waiting for the right time to escape using all his ready [[spell]]s.
document_data.Relationship: Elaint had a close relationship with Kara Calaudra, a thing that greatly worried his father [[Peuter Marsk]].
